arguments.name: Old_text
arguments.description: Text in which you want to replace some characters.

arguments.name: Start_num
arguments.description: The position of the character in old_text that you want to replace with new_text.

arguments.name: Num_chars
arguments.description: The number of characters in old_text that you want REPLACE to replace with new_text.

arguments.name: New_text
arguments.description: The text that will replace characters in old_text.
